description:
This market refers to the tennis match between Aleksandar Kovacevic and Mackenzie McDonald in the Open Sud de France, scheduled for February 2 2026.
This market will resolve to "Kovacevic" if Aleksandar Kovacevic wins by 2 or more sets than Mackenzie McDonald, based on the final completed score. Otherwise, it will resolve to "McDonald."
If the match begins but is not completed, this market will resolve 50-50. If the match is canceled before play begins or delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a result, this market will also resolve 50-50.
Resolution will be based on official ATP results.

events.description:
This market refers on the tennis match between Mackenzie McDonald and Aleksandar Kovacevic in the Open Sud de France, scheduled for February 2 at 4:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'McDonald' if Mackenzie McDonald advances against Aleksandar Kovacevic.

This market will resolve to 'Kovacevic' if Aleksandar Kovacevic advances against Mackenzie McDonald.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match begins but is not completed, and one player advances due to the opponent's retirement, default, or disqualification, this market will resolve to the player who advances.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
events.title: Open Sud de France: Mackenzie McDonald vs Aleksandar Kovacevic

groupItemTitle: Open Sud de France: Mackenzie McDonald vs Aleksandar Kovacevic Set Handicap +/-1.5
question: Set Handicap: Kovacevic (-1.5) vs McDonald (+1.5)
